**This is solely for job seekers with disabilities requiring accessibility assistance or an accommodation in the job application process. Messages left for other purposes will not receive a response.**

title: IT Category Manager – Gig på 6-9 månader
description:
Vi söker nu en erfaren **IT Category Manager** som vill ta sig an ett spännande konsultuppdrag med fokus på strategiska IT-upphandlingar, kontraktshantering och leverantörsstyrning.


**Om uppdraget**  

I rollen kommer du ansvara för att driva egna IT-sourcingaktiviteter och hantera kontrakt för koncerngemensamma applikationer, IT-infrastruktur, mjukvara och molntjänster. Du kommer arbeta nära interna intressenter och externa leverantörer för att säkerställa att kontrakten är både strategiskt rätt och följer gällande regelverk.

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**


Förhandla och hantera kontrakt med stora mjukvaruleverantörer.


Säkerställa att kontrakt stödjer strategiska mål och regelefterlevnad


Optimera leverantörsrelationer och driva leverantörsutveckling


Delta i interna och externa styrningsmöten


Bidra till utvecklingen av sourcingstrategier och teamets arbetssätt


**Vi söker dig som har:**


Universitetsexamen eller motsvarande


5–10 års erfarenhet av IT-sourcing och upphandling


Dokumenterad framgång i förhandlingar med globala mjukvaruleverantörer, t.ex. Microsoft


Mycket god kommunikativ förmåga på svenska och engelska


Förmåga att arbeta självständigt, driva projekt och leverera i tid


Ett affärsdrivet mindset och intresse för att skapa långsiktiga lösningar


**Praktisk information:**

**Start:** Omgående

**Omfattning:** 6–9 månader, 50–100%

**Plats:** Stockholm, med möjlighet till hybridarbete (några dagar/vecka på plats)

**Resor:** Cirka 30 dagar/år, både inom Sverige och internationellt


Vill du ta nästa steg i din karriär och sätta din prägel på strategiska IT-upphandlingar?


Skicka in din ansökan redan idag – vi intervjuar löpande.

title: IT-Technician
description:
* **️ What We Do**


Swiftly gaining ground as Sweden’s industry leader in battery storage and expanding rapidly in selected European markets, Flower is on a mission to enable the energy system of tomorrow.
With an industry-leading AI-powered platform at its core, our service includes stabilizing the energy system by enhancing predictability and flexibility for both energy producers and consumers. By combining pioneering technology with a portfolio of flexible energy assets, we break new ground towards a fossil-free energy system, allowing clean energy to power society.

**Who We Are**  

Tech company at heart – purpose in our DNA. Flower consists of a diverse group of innovative individuals with a strong desire to improve the state of the world.


At Flower, we believe trust, collaboration and diversity are essential to not only create an inclusive work environment, but also drive career growth. By embracing varying perspectives, we allow creativity and progress to flourish.


To accelerate towards our goal of becoming the pioneering force powering the energy system of tomorrow, we are now looking for a passionate and skilled **I**T-Technician.

**‍ About The Role:**

  

The candidate will join a vibrant and dynamic workplace, with the opportunity to make a lasting impact on Flower’s journey and the freedom to shape both the role and the solutions. They will play a key role in ensuring the availability, security, and effective management of the company’s IT ecosystem and the employee endpoints. The role involves close collaboration with relevant colleagues such as the Security Officer and COO.


**What You’ll Do:**  



* Manage and configure software suites such as Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, and Atlassian
* Install, configure, and update hardware and software (e.g., PCs, Macs, Microsoft Intune, and Defender) to ensure smooth operations and security
* Handle onboarding, offboarding and access management
* Provide technical support to employees and troubleshoot hardware and software issues
* Research and implement the best solutions and tools based on specific needs and situations
* Follow security principles and best practices to safeguard infrastructure and endpoints
* Contribute to the development of IT guidelines, roadmaps and procurement
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and address IT needs  
* 

**Who You Are:**  



* Curious and solution-oriented
* Have a strong team mindset while also being able to work independently
* Comfortable initiating and running projects from scratch, and unafraid to make mistakes
* Security-aware and mindful of best practices
* Hold an undergraduate degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or have equivalent working experience
Have at least 2 years of relevant work experience in a similar role  
* 

 **Location**  

Our beautiful office is located in the heart of Södermalm just a short walk from Slussen subway station. We encourage in-office collaboration but support a hybrid work model.


**✉️ Apply**  

Our corporate language is English, as we have over 20 nationalities in the office. We therefore appreciate it if you could submit your CV in English.  

Throughout the recruitment process you will meet with the People & Talent Partner, Security Officer, COO and our CEO.  

  



We look forward to hearing from you!  



-

*We kindly but firmly decline any engagement in recruitment assistance for our hiring processes. This includes partnership offers or the sale of recruitment tools.*

title: Azure Cloud Engineer / DevOps Engineer
description:
**About the Role**


We are building a global Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) solution on Microsoft Azure, using a modern microservice-based architecture and Azure Container Apps (ACA).
  

Our Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) team owns and operates the shared Azure platform that enables our development teams to deliver secure, observable, and scalable software products worldwide.


Our ambition is to establish world-class operations with fully automated CI/CD pipelines (Bicep + Azure DevOps), and to deliver reusable platform capabilities ("Towers") – such as Observability, Security, Networking, CI/CD, and Automation – as managed services to our dev teams.


**The SRE team is responsible for:**


* Central and shared infrastructure in Azure
* Platform architecture and governance
* Operational excellence: SLAs/OLAs, cost control, compliance, performance, reliability
* Support and operations for global production environments (follow-the-sun model)

We follow proven cloud design patterns and frameworks:
  

Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF), Enterprise Scale, Well-Architected Framework (WAF) – with strong focus on Zero Trust, Hub & Spoke, RBAC, and continuous improvement.


You will join as an Azure Cloud Engineer, working closely with our Cloud Architect / Product Owner and global team. You'll help build the foundation of our platform, support developers, and contribute to upskilling team members. The SRE team is part of R&D and works agile – using Scrum, PI Planning, Sprints and Kanban in Azure DevOps.


We actively promote a "You Build It, You Run It" culture, where dev teams own their services – supported by CloudOps through robust and standardized Towers.


**What You’ll Do**


* Design, build and maintain Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Bicep and Azure DevOps
* Operate and evolve central Azure services: networking, security, identity, cost control, monitoring, policy
* Develop and maintain observability stacks: Azure Monitor, Log Analytics, App Insights
* Drive automation across deployment, scaling, compliance, and incident response
* Support dev teams in adopting platform capabilities (Towers) and best practices
* Define and maintain platform SLAs/OLAs, security baselines, and performance objectives
* Mentor junior engineers in Azure, IaC, and DevOps ways of working

**What We’re Looking For**


* Proven hands-on experience with Microsoft Azure and IaC (Bicep, ARM, Terraform)
* Strong background in CI/CD using Azure DevOps or similar tools and background in SRE/DevOps/platform teams, ideally in a SaaS/PaaS context
* Deep understanding of Azure services: networking, RBAC, identity, policy, security
* Experience with containerized workloads (ACA, AKS, Docker)
* Familiarity with monitoring/logging pipelines and alerting strategies
* Scripting skills in PowerShell, Bash or Python
* Good communication skills in English (Swedish is a bonus)
* Knowledge of CAF, WAF, DevSecOps and FinOps best practices


Relevant certifications (AZ-104, AZ-400, AZ-305) are a plus.

**What We Offer**


* A hands-on and strategic role in shaping our global Azure platform
* Clear technical ownership and real architectural impact
* Close collaboration with product, engineering, and cloud leaders
* Learning & development opportunities – training, mentorship, certification

**Interested?**


This position is open internally across all of Novacura globally. If you're passionate about Azure, IaC, DevOps, and want to help build the backbone of a next-gen PaaS platform – reach out!

title: Delivery Director
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
**För dig som vill skapa verkligt kundvärde och driva framtidens leveranser**
 Vi söker en Delivery Director som vill ta ett helhetsansvar för projekt, åtaganden och affärsutveckling – och som brinner för att skapa verkligt värde till våra kunder med hög kvalitet, i rätt tid och med struktur. Du kommer att ha en nyckelroll i vår leveransorganisation, där du leder både strategiska och operativa delar av våra uppdrag.
   

  

 Du är en person som värdesätter struktur och tydlighet, men som framför allt har förmågan att omvandla det till effekt för kunden. Du trivs i samarbetet med andra kompetenser och bidrar till att utveckla våra arbetssätt och vår leveransförmåga på bolagsnivå.
   

  

**Vad du kommer att göra**
 Som Delivery Director har du ett övergripande ansvar för hur vi levererar i större projekt och åtaganden – från kontrakt och förväntansbild till genomförande och uppföljning. Du är med och driver anbudsarbete, affärsdialoger och kundrelationer, och du säkerställer att
 **vår leverans håller hög kvalitet, skapar värde och bidrar till kundens mål.**
 Du blir också en viktig del i hur vi
 **stärker vår leveransförmåga internt** 
 – genom att utveckla metoder, coacha andra och sprida struktur och lärande i hela organisationen.
   

  

**Vem vi söker**
 Du är en person som:
   

  

* Har ett starkt driv att skapa resultat för kund och bidra till verklig nytta
* Har ett starkt kvalitetsfokus och gillar att leverera med precision
* Trivs med struktur och kvalitet – men förstår när man ska vara flexibel
* Är kommunikativ och delar gärna med dig av kunskap
* Har lätt för att se samband, möjligheter och lösningar
* Är trygg i olika roller – som projektsponsor, rådgivare, förhandlingsledare eller affärsutvecklare
* Har god förmåga att engagera och leda team mot gemensamma mål


**Kvalifikationer**
* Relevant högskoleutbildning, gärna inom IT eller teknik
* Flerårig erfarenhet av projekt- och portföljledning, gärna från konsultbranschen
* Erfarenhet av implementationsprojekt
* Erfarenhet av roller där affärsutveckling och kommersiellt ansvar varit centrala delar
* Du är van att kommunicera på både svenska och engelska, i såväl affärsdialoger som dokumentation och presentationer.


**Vad vi erbjuder**
 Hos oss får du vara med och leverera projekt som gör skillnad – för våra kunder och för samhället. Vi har höga ambitioner och engagerade kollegor. Du blir en del av spännande projekt med stort affärsvärde och får möjlighet att utvecklas både professionellt och personligt. Vi erbjuder konkurrenskraftiga villkor, generösa försäkrings- och pensionslösningar, sex veckors semester och tillgång till friskvårdsaktiviteter.
   

  

**Rekryteringsprocessen**
 Den består av ett personlighets- och logiktest via Alva Labs samt tre intervjuer. Vi genomför även referenstagning och bakgrundskontroll som en del av processen.
   

  

**Ansök nu** 
 och bli en del av ett team som strävar efter att leverera med kvalitet – varje dag.
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: IT-administratör | Stockholm | Experis
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
Har du ett IT-intresse och lätt för att lära dig nya saker? Tycker du om att arbeta i grupp med andra? Experis söker nu en IT-administratör. Är du vass på datorer och IT samt är ute efter en ny utmaning? Sök redan idag!🚀
   

  

 Arbetsbeskrivning
   

  

 I den här rollen kommer du att få möjlighet att arbeta som IT-administratör. Tillsammans med dina kollegor ser du till att allt ser rätt ut i systemen som ni arbetar i. Som IT-konsult hos oss på Experis öppnas dörren till en värld av utveckling, utmaningar och en gemenskap där din huvudsakliga uppgift är att vara räddaren i nöden för dina kollegor när det gäller IT-relaterade utmaningar.
   

  

 Din arbetsdag blir som en resa genom IT-landskapet där du navigerar genom teknikmiljöer, kringutrustning, operativsystem, nätverk och informationssäkerhet. Ditt engagemang är avgörande för att lösa tekniska problem och se till att arbetsdagen flyter smidigt för alla.
   

  

 Din vardag hos oss - aldrig en tråkig dag!
   

  

 Vi på Experis lovar att varje dag blir unik. Du kommer att jobba både självständigt och i nära samarbete med dina kollegor för att lösa problem på bästa sätt. Det ger dig inte bara en bredare kunskapsbas utan också ett starkt nätverk. Och glöm inte att du kommer stöta på varierande arbetsuppgifter som håller dig på tårna!
   

  

 Nyfiken på att veta mer? Ta kontakt med Vilma Andersson eller Dara Tysani, så berättar vi gladeligen vilka vi är!
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* Gymnasial relevant utbildning
* Övergripande kunskap om datorer, kringutrustning, operativsystem, nätverk och informationssäkerhet
* Kunskaper i Microsoft Office eller likvärdigt
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


 Vem är du?
   

  

 Vi tror att du är en flexibel och ansvarstagande person med ett genuint teknikintresse. Noggrannhet och serviceanda är dina ledord, och du tycker om att kommunicera med människor i alla lägen. Det viktigaste för oss är att du bär med dig en positiv inställning, driv och vilja att utvecklas!
   

  

 Om Experis
   

  

 Experis är ett ledande, globalt konsultbolag inom IT/Tech med över 600 konsulter på uppdrag i Sverige och 22 000 konsulter runt om i världen. Via Experis får du tillgång till en stor variation av spännande uppdrag hos våra intressanta kunder inom både privat och offentlig sektor. Du kan anta uppdrag genom ditt eget bolag eller som tillsvidareanställd konsult. På Experis blir du en i teamet och får tillgång till ett brett nätverk av kollegor inom ditt kompetensområde.
   

  

 På Experis får du en personlig konsultchef och kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling så att du kan hålla dig ajour med ny teknik. Experis, som är en del av ManpowerGroup, har ett långsiktigt hållbarhetsarbete (Working to change the world - ESG strategy) med målsättningen att bidra till att lösa kompetensbristen av bland annat IT-resurser.
   

  

 Vi på Experis är ett värderingsstyrt bolag, och allt vi gör genomsyras av våra värderingar People, Knowledge och Innovation.
   

  

**People |** 
 Vi inkluderar och välkomnar alla oavsett roll, funktion eller ansvar. Vi värderar kompetens och har förtroende för att individen tar eget ansvar och levererar inom ramen för sin rollbeskrivning. Vi är prestigelösa och vårt arbetsklimat bygger på öppenhet och trygghet.
   

  

**Knowledge |** 
 Vi har ett "growth mindset" och håller oss relevanta på marknaden genom att ständigt förflytta och höja vår egen kompetens, våra konsulters samt våra lösningar/erbjudanden.
   

  

**Innovation |** 
 Vi vågar testa nytt och misslyckas. Det kräver mod. Vi har ett utifrån och in-fokus och arbetar hela tiden med värdeskapande aktiviteter för våra målgrupper.
   

  

 Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?
   

  

 På Experis är vi stolta över våra konsulter och tillsammans hittar vi rätt utmaningar för dig. Vi har höga förväntningar på dig, men i gengäld erbjuder vi dig goda utvecklings- och karriärmöjligheter. Förutom möjligheten att utveckla dina kunskaper ute på spännande uppdrag erbjuds du provanställning enligt kollektivavtal, marknadsmässig månadslön, reglerad semester och semestersättning, friskvårdsbidrag, tjänstepension och försäkring, samt många andra förmåner - precis som det alltid ska vara.
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Detta är en generell annons för flertalet olika roller inom IT-administration. När du skickar in din ansökan till oss kommer vi att granska den och bedöma om din profil matchar våra behov. Vi kommer därefter att bjuda in dig till en dialog med någon av våra Talent Acquisition Specialists om du har en matchande profil. Oavsett hur processen fortlöper kommer du alltid att få återkoppling.
   

  

 Gör Experis till din nästa destination!
   

  

 Har du fått upp ögonen för denna möjlighet? Kontakta Dara Tysani på mailadress dara.tysani@se.experis.com för att höra mer om vad vi har att erbjuda! Vi är bara ett samtal bort från din nästa utmaning.
   

  

**Vänta inte, låt IT-äventyret börja!** 
 🚀

title: Senior Solution Architect
description:
**Job Description**
**WHAT YOU’LL DO**
 We are seeking an experienced Solution Architect who will be responsible for the architecture of POS solutions, ensuring alignment with enterprise architecture standards and advancing the architecture toward the target state.
   

  

 In addition to the above, your role will involve:
   

  

* Defining a shared technical and architectural vision focused on creating technical alignment for the full solution rather than concerns for specific components.
* Reviewing, analyzing, developing and facilitating stakeholder understanding of business and technology implications of future direction, roadmaps and implementation plans.
* Creating architectural design to guide and contextualize solution development across initiatives that align with business and IT goals.
* Providing necessary leadership, analysis and design tasks related to the development of technology solutions to ensure that solutions meet business needs and align with architectural governance and security standards.
* Identifying interdependencies and using ‘holistic thinking’ to ensure a cross-team perspective. Provide consulting support around solution architecture to teams to ensure a product is aligned with the overall enterprise architecture.
* Translating business and technical requirements into architectural blueprints and documenting all solution architecture design and analysis.
* Evaluating and driving continuous improvement, reducing technical debt, and enhancing end-to-end business value.
* Taking ownership and responsibility of current solutions and flows and ensuring secure and stable operations with a good focus on resolving recurring problems to the root cause.


**Who You’ll Work With**
 In our Unit, you’ll work with a dynamic team and oversee the integration and customization of several vendor-provided POS systems which impact 4000+ stores across 60+ countries.
   

  

 We frequently collaborate with our vendors, business, and internal tech stakeholders from various departments.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We are looking for people with…
   

  

* Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* 8 - 10 years’ experience working in multiple software engineering-related roles, whereof 5+ years’ experience in a Solution Architecture capacity.
* Experience in working with all components of a holistic enterprise architecture (business, process, information, technology).
* Exposure to multiple, diverse technologies and processing environments.
* Solid understanding of modern development practices, technologies and software architecture including patterns and principles.
* Exceptional problem-solving, communication, and leadership skills.
* Proven experience from documenting and communicating architecture and experience in tools like Jira, confluence etc.
* Proven experience in designing solutions using patterns, following best practices etc. to comply with non-functional requirements.
* Experience working with POS is a merit.


 And people who have:
   

  

* Strong communication skills, with the ability to effectively convey complex technical concepts to a range of stakeholders.
* Experience in story exploration and refinement.
* Ability to troubleshoot independently and drive solutions to completion.
* Collaborative and willing to share knowledge with the team to foster a supportive learning environment.


**Who We Are**
 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  

 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  

**JOIN US**
 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  

 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.

title: Technical Customer Care Specialist
description:
Vi söker en driven Technical Customer Care Specialist!
   

  

 Vi är ett lönsamt mjukvarubolag med en stark tillväxt och möjligheterna för personlig utveckling och påverkan är stora. Är du en problemlösare med teknisk kunskap och en passion för service? Vill du spela en nyckelroll i att säkerställa våra kunders dagliga framgång genom tillförlitlig teknisk support? Då kan du vara den vi söker!
   

  

 Vi förenklar och automatiserar komplexa processer kring inköp och fakturahantering för primärt större organisationer genom vår molntjänst Proceedo.
   

  

 Som Technical Customer Care Specialist Kommer Du Att Ha En Central Roll i Vårt Team, Och Ansvara För Att
   

  

* Leverera 2nd Line support och bidra till en ökad kundnöjdhet.
* Förbättra och underhålla självbetjäningskanaler för att minimera återkommande frågor
* Kontinuerligt förbättra och uppdatera vår kunskapsbas och våra processer


**Dina Huvudsakliga Arbetsuppgifter**
* Hantera inkommande ärenden och ge support kring användning av Proceedo
* Genomföra teknisk felsökning och vara delaktig i att lösa incidenter
* Säkerställa en snabb och kvalitativ service för att stödja och utveckla kundernas användning av vår lösning.


 Vem är du?:
   

  

* Eftergymnasial teknisk utbildning eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet inom IT eller relaterade områden
* Flytande svenska och engelska.
* Enastående kommunikations- och problemlösningsförmågor
* Förmåga att samarbeta effektivt i team och bidra till ett positivt arbetsklimat
* Grundläggande kunskaper inom ekonomi är fördelaktigt och ses som en bonus


 Vi erbjuder dig en innovativ och dynamisk arbetsmiljö där ditt engagemang och din utveckling står i centrum. Tillsammans strävar vi efter att överträffa våra kunders förväntningar och skapa framtidens digitala lösningar.
   

  

 Låter detta som något för dig? Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade team!
   

  

***Vilka är vi på Visma Proceedo?***
*Vi är ett företag som är med och formar vårt samhälles framtid. I Visma globalt är vi över 14 000 medarbetare som brinner för att utveckla världsledande molntjänster. Hos oss på Visma Proceedo, som en del av Visma, är vi 100 engagerade medarbetare fokuserade på vår produkt. Vi är ett familjärt och vänligt företag som värdesätter entreprenörskap, där många trivs och ofta stannar i många år.*

title: Creative Marketing Internship
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Marketing Services, and Climate Data and Analytics
description:
**This is a Paid Internship** 




  





**Role:** 
 Creative Marketing Internship
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm
 



**Start Date:** 
 Immediately
 



**Duration:** 
 9-12 month paid internship
 



  





 Shape your Marketing career at an exceptional company
 **Tata Consultancy Services (TCS).**




 With more than 600,000 employees globally, we work with leading companies across industries helping them achieve their business goals and lead their digital transformation.
 



  





**Your assignments** 



* Design engaging content
* Transform complex information into simple, visually appealing formats
* Ideate and develop creative concepts for campaigns and presentations
* Design high-quality visuals using Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)
* Create impactful PowerPoint presentations with strong storytelling and design
* Produce and edit videos in collaboration with agencies or independently
* Use tools like AI-based design platforms, Adobe, and Canva to create marketing assets



  





**Your Qualifications** 



* Enrollment in a Yrkeshögskola (YH-program) or bachelor’s degree program (at least in the 3rd semester), or in a Master's degree program.
* Ability to write technically precise content
* Proficiency in the use of Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word)
* Proficiency in use of graphic design tools such as Adobe, Canva etc.
* Experience in using AI for content creation preferred
* Creative mindset with a flair for design
* Experience in the field of IT is preferred
* Strong research and analytical skills
* Business fluent in English and Swedish language
* Strong interest in an international working environment
* Structured and independent way of working
* Availability for the position for six nine to twelve months



  





**Does that sound interesting?** 




  





 You are welcome to submit your application consisting of your CV, personal letter, relevant degrees or certifications details, professional references, etc. We work with ongoing recruitment so send in your application as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to receiving your application via LinkedIn or mail to
 **ajay.androw@tcs.com** 




  





**About TCS** 




  





 TCS ranks amongst global top 3 technology consulting companies across multiple parameters: revenues, employees, market valuation and brand value. In Sweden we work with more than 50 companies who are leaders in their own space. With them we have long term and trustful relationships. TCS in Sweden and Nordics has been ranked as a Top Employer for 12 consecutive years that reflects the organization’s commitment to an inclusive, empowered and entrepreneurial work culture.
 



  





 At Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) Europe, we believe in the power of technology to build a better future for Europe. Our Corporate Affairs division plays a key role in shaping this future by promoting strong relationships with governments, institutions, and communities across the continent. We are committed to responsible business practices, thought leadership, and active engagement in policy discussions that impact our industry and the communities we serve within the European Union.
 



  





 With a history of over 45 years in Europe, TCS is a transformation partner for companies in industries that range from banking and retail to insurance and travel. Our agile and diverse workforce is distributed in 62 offices across Europe.
 



  




* TCS has been ranked number 1 in Customer Satisfaction in Europe for 12 consecutive years.
* TCS has been named Top Employer in Europe for 13 consecutive years
* TCS has been recognized as one of the world’s Top 50 Brands by Kantar BrandZ in 2025
* 80,000 associates are supporting clients in Europe.



  





 For more information, visit
 
 www.tcs.com
 




 Follow TCS on
 
 LinkedIn
 
 |
 
 Instagram
 
 |
 
 YouTube
 




  





**Privacy Note:** 




**https://ibegin.tcs.com/iBegin/privacy-notice**

* Kontinuerligt förbättra och uppdatera vår kunskapsbas och våra processer


 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:
   

  

* Hantera inkommande ärenden och ge support kring användning av Proceedo
* Genomföra teknisk felsökning och vara delaktig i att lösa incidenter
* Säkerställa en snabb och kvalitativ service för att stödja och utveckla kundernas användning av vår lösning.


 Vem är du?:
   

  

* Eftergymnasial teknisk utbildning eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet inom IT eller relaterade områden
* Flytande svenska och engelska.
* Enastående kommunikations- och problemlösningsförmågor
* Förmåga att samarbeta effektivt i team och bidra till ett positivt arbetsklimat
* Grundläggande kunskaper inom ekonomi är fördelaktigt och ses som en bonus


 Vi erbjuder dig en innovativ och dynamisk arbetsmiljö där ditt engagemang och din utveckling står i centrum. Tillsammans strävar vi efter att överträffa våra kunders förväntningar och skapa framtidens digitala lösningar.
   

  

 Låter detta som något för dig? Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade team!
   

  

***Vilka är vi på Visma Proceedo?***
*Vi är ett företag som är med och formar vårt samhälles framtid. I Visma globalt är vi över 14 000 medarbetare som brinner för att utveckla världsledande molntjänster. Hos oss på Visma Proceedo, som en del av Visma, är vi 100 engagerade medarbetare fokuserade på vår produkt. Vi är ett familjärt och vänligt företag som värdesätter entreprenörskap, där många trivs och ofta stannar i många år.*

title: Internship – Sustainability in Business & Technology
description:
**Internship – Sustainability in Business & Technology** 




**Location: Stockholm** 




**Start Date: immediately** 




  





 Shape your Business-IT consulting career at an exceptional company Tata Consultancy Services (TCS).
 



 With more than 600,000 employees globally, we work with leading companies across industries helping them achieve their business goals and lead their digital transformation.
 



  





 TCS ranks amongst global top 3 technology consulting companies across multiple parameters: revenues, employees, market valuation and brand value.
 



 In Sweden we work with more than 50 companies who are leaders in their own space. With them we have long term and trustful relationships. TCS in Sweden and Nordics has been ranked as a Top Employer for 12 consecutive years that reflects the organization’s commitment to inclusive, empowered and entrepreneurial work culture.
 



 TCS follows the Tata Group philosophy of building sustainable businesses that are rooted in the community and committed to the environment. Corporate sustainability is part of our triple aim: people, planet and purpose. Our focus is on reducing carbon emissions, using renewable energy and focusing on a regenerative approach to business. How do we make this possible? By creating greater awareness of the environment in which we live through collaboration with our employees, suppliers, customers and society at large.
 



**We look forward to receiving your application for joining us on the exciting journey as we keep pushing the boundaries to create a safer, happier, environmentally rich and sustainable world around us.** 




  





  





**Your Internship Activities & Perspectives** 



* Support the Sustainability team in reviewing internal and external sustainability reports and prioritizing areas of engagement
* Study EU regulations and implication on Sweden & Nordics. Support compliance projects
* Analyze the regulatory framework and standards for sustainability in the country and understand their impact on the business
* Collaborate with the sustainability team on research and advisory services related to strategy, organization and processes for sustainable value chains, impact measurement, data analysis
* Understand SDG goals and related priorities for TCS Sweden
* Support coordination of Sustainability initiatives within TCS and its Customers
* Support the development of Sustainability focussed business and technology experiences in TCS Stockholm Pace Studio (i.e. TCS Innovation Hub)
* Prepare research papers and business presentations for Sales and Account teams
* Study industry-specific initiatives and assist team with market development
* Prepare research papers and business presentations
* Profile, Prepare and Participate in relevant Sustainability conferences on topics such as energy transition, circular economy, food and biodiversity, etc.



  





**Your Qualifications** 



* Enrollment in a Bachelor's or Master's degree program
* Experience in the field of sustainability gained through project work, internships or extracurricular activities
* Understanding of key sustainability issues in the country and in key industries
* Enthusiasm and Experience in digital technologies: GenAI, Low-Code programming technology to create simulations and use cases
* Strong proficiency in the use of Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word)
* Strong research and analytical skills
* Passion for personal and professional development related to the SDGs
* Organizational talent and coordination skills
* Openness to an international working environment
* Structured and independent way of working
* Business fluent in English and Swedish
* Availability for more than 6 months

title: Senior IT-Operations Specialist
description:
**Hej, Truecaller is calling you from Stockholm, Sweden! Ready to pick up?** 




  





 Our goal is to make communication smarter, safer, and more efficient, while building trust across the world. With our roots in Sweden and a global reach, we deliver smart services that create meaningful social impact. We are committed to protecting you from fraud, harassment, scam calls, and unwanted messages, so you can focus on the conversations that matter.
 


* Top 20 most downloaded apps globally, and world’s #1 caller ID and spam-blocking service for Android and iOS, with extensive AI capabilities, with more than
 **450 million active users** 
 per month.
* Founded in 2009, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm and is categorized as a Large Cap. Our focus on innovation, operational excellence, sustainable growth, and collaboration has resulted in consistently high profitability and strong EBITDA margins.
* A team of 400 people from ~35 different nationalities spread across our headquarters in Stockholm and offices in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon and Tel Aviv with high ambitions.



  





 As a
 **Senior IT-Operations Specialist** 
 , you will balance a mix of both technical support and system administration, ensuring the smooth operation of both end-user devices and network infrastructure. You will be responsible for troubleshooting hardware, software, and network issues across a multi-operating system environment, including Microsoft Windows, macOS, and Linux (a small minority). Additionally, you will play a key role in onboarding new employees, provisioning system accounts, maintaining IT inventory, and managing vendor relationships, all while ensuring compliance with ISO standards.
 



  





**The impact you will create:** 



* End-User Support – provide IT support for employees..
* New Employee Onboarding – set up and configure laptops, user accounts, and system access for new hires, ensuring a smooth onboarding experience.
* Network & System Administration – configure and troubleshoot routers, switches, firewalls, and wireless access points.
* User Account & Access Management – provision and deactivate system accounts, email accounts, and application access, ensuring ISO compliance
* Hardware & Software Inventory Management – maintain an up-to-date inventory of IT assets, including laptops, peripherals, and software licenses
* Software & License Management – purchase, renew, and track software licenses and IT assets to ensure compliance and availability
* Vendor & Procurement Management – coordinate with vendors for hardware/software purchases, IT services, and contract renewals
* System Security & Compliance – ensure IT operations align with ISO certification requirements, access control policies, security best practices, and IT governance
* Documentation & Process Improvement – maintain IT documentation, update asset records, and contribute to process enhancements to meet compliance and audit requirements



  





**What you bring in:** 



* Strong Communication & Customer Service Skills – ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical users and provide excellent support
* IT Support & Troubleshooting Expertise – proven ability to provide IT support in a multi-OS environment (Windows, macOS, Linux) with a strong understanding of hardware, software, and peripheral troubleshooting
* Systems Administration Knowledge – hands-on experience managing user accounts, system access, and authentication protocols (Active Directory, Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, or similar)
* Networking Knowledge & Administration – understanding of network fundamentals, including LAN management, VLAN configuration, switch setup, and WiFi network troubleshooting
* Network Monitoring & Troubleshooting – ability to monitor network performance, diagnose LAN issues, and resolve connectivity problems



  





**It would be great if you also have:** 



* Basic knowledge of GCP - be able to conduct access reviews, provisioning of access and similar administrative tasks.
* Firewall & Security Awareness – familiarity with pfSense or similar firewall solutions for managing network security and traffic rules
* Virtualization & Infrastructure – understanding of virtual machines (VMs) and experience with Xen or similar virtualization platform



  





**Life at Truecaller -** 
 Behind the code:
 **https://www.instagram.com/lifeattruecaller/**




  





**Sounds like your dream job?** 




 We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate, so please send your application as soon as possible. As part of the recruitment process, we will conduct a background check.
 



  





**This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.** 




 We only accept applications
 **in English** 
 .
 



  





**What we offer:** 



* **A smart, talented, and agile team:** 
 An international team where ~35 nationalities are working together in several locations and time zones with a learning, sharing, and fun environment.
* **A great compensation package** 
 : Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible working hours, private health insurance, parental leave top-up, pension contribution, Udemy membership to keep learning and improving, and free gym membership.
* **Great tech tools:** 
 Pick the computer and phone you most fancy within our budget ranges.
* **Office life:** 
 We strongly believe in in-person collaboration and follow an office-first approach while offering some flexibility. Enjoy your days with great colleagues with loads of good stuff to learn from, and a wide range of yummy snacks and beverages. In addition, every now and then check out the playroom for a fun break or join our exciting parties and or team activities such as Lab days, Running team, movie nights in our cinema, or a Geek lunch. There’s something for everyone!



  





**Come as you are:** 




 Truecaller is diverse, equal, and inclusive. We need a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences to keep building our great products. No matter where you are based, which language you speak, your accent, race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, etc
 **.** 
 All those things make you who you are, and that’s why we would love to meet you.

title: Internship: Data & Knowledge Manager
description:
**Facts** 

**Start:** 
 As soon as possible
 



**Duration** 
 : 3–6 months
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm - flexible about hybrid work
 



  




**About the opportunity** 

 We’re looking for a
 **Data & Knowledge Management Intern** 
 to help us organise, update, and future-proof the information that powers our projects. This role is perfect for someone who thrives on turning complex, scattered information into clear, structured, and accessible knowledge. You’ll be working across multiple team and platforms to make sure our teams, partners, and future products have the right information at their fingertips.
 



 This role is ideal if you’re detail-focused, curious, and eager to dive into both the technical and storytelling sides of our work. You’ll play a key role in ensuring we can phase out outdated systems, keep our project data fresh, and build resources that will help others learn, collaborate, and take climate action.
 



**The role offers:** 



* Hands-on experience with real projects that do environmental and social impact work in the Global South as well as carbon methodologies
* Flexible working arrangements (remote or on-site)
* Exposure to cross-functional collaboration with product, operations, and sustainability teams
* Learning opportunities directly from the Product Managers and experienced professionals
* A front-row seat to how methodology changes from registries and standards bodies impact our operations
* The opportunity to work on resources that will fuel our project portal, AI chatbot, and learning library
* Potential for long-term employment for the right candidate


**Responsibilities** 
* Organise and maintain existing datasets with the latest, most reliable information from real projects
* Help create content for new learning outcomes for project developers looking to get into the biochar carbon removal space, working with experts to fine tune it.
* Migrate information into new systems to improve efficiency and accessibility
* Create and manage knowledge resources, including FAQs and learning materials, for both internal and external audiences
* Develop engaging, anonymised project case studies for our resource library
* Research and compile relevant industry resources and opportunities to support our projects


**Requirements** 
* Currently studying or recently graduated in Environmental Science, Data Management, Knowledge Management, Sustainability, or related fields
* Proficient with spreadsheets (Excel/Google Sheets) and comfortable working with large datasets
* Strong attention to detail and ability to keep complex information organised
* Comfortable navigating and updating structured digital systems (e.g. Notion, Airtable, or similar)
* Strong English written & communication skills for distilling technical information into clear, user-friendly language
* Self-driven, proactive, and unafraid to ask questions or flag issues
* Curious about carbon removal, regenerative agriculture, and the Global South


**Tools & Systems You’ll Use** 
* Google Sheets / Excel
* Google Drive
* Notion (for migration) and successor systems
* Airtable or similar database tools
* Project portals and documentation systems
* Industry standards/methodology documents
* Slack


**Bonus Points** 
* Experience with data migration or digital archiving projects
* Understanding of carbon removal methodologies and metrics
* Familiarity with agricultural lab analysis data or soil science
* Ability to summarise and tag learning materials for educational platforms
* Interest in knowledge management for AI training


**Who we are and why work with us?** 

 We are a diverse team of surfers, scientists, farmers, rebels and humans tackling a global problem. We came together as friends with a shared passion for sustainability, and strive to grow a global business that will have a positive impact on the planet. We value passion, integrity and fun.
 



 Guided by our values of Win-Win collaboration, Relentlessness, and Authenticity, we're committed to removing CO2 and addressing global inequality. Our approach blends long-term perspectives with short-term actions, ensuring sustainability and a positive impact. We foster open communication, collaboration, and a solution-oriented mindset, urging our team to embrace change and contribute to our journey towards global peace.
 



**Join Our Team:** 
 Be part of a workplace where diversity of thought is celebrated, and great minds don't think alike. At Planboo, we believe in simplicity, effectiveness, and continuous learning, providing a platform for you to contribute to global change while growing both personally and professionally.
   




**﻿Our Benefits** 
* Opportunity to make a tangible climate impact from day one
* Potential to travel to project sites in some parts of the Global South
* Flexible working hours and location
* Work alongside a diverse, mission-driven team



 If this sounds like your kind of challenge, send your CV to
 **marc@planboo.eco** 
 . In a few lines, tell us your story and why this opportunity excites you.

title: Embedded Systems & IoT Engineer
description:
**Who We Are** 




 At EVEWAVE, we’re rethinking global logistics towards zero-waste systems. Our reusable, modular pallet units replace single-use packaging, improving safety, efficiency, and sustainability across the supply chain. Our embedded sensors deliver real-time data, and our modular design gives companies complete transparency and control over how goods move. You’ll help build the hardware systems that make it all possible.
 



  





**Why This Role Matters** 




 As our Embedded Systems & IoT Engineer, you’ll design and develop the electronics that connect our products to the cloud. From power management and sensor integration to secure, low-power data transmission, your work will shape the nervous system of our zero-waste logistics platform.
 



  





**What You'll Do** 



* Develop electronic interfaces for snap-on modules (power + data bus)
* Integrate battery management systems, environmental sensors (tilt, temperature, vibration), and communication modules (Bluetooth, LoRa, 5G)
* Optimize low-power firmware for event-based logging and baseline profiling
* Ensure secure, reliable data transmission under real-world transport conditions



  





**What You Bring** 



* BSc or MSc in Electrical/Electronics Engineering, Computer Engineering, or related field
* Experience with microcontrollers and IoT protocols (MQTT, LPWAN)
* Skills in sensor integration, PCB design, and firmware development
* Bonus: Familiarity with low-power design and industrial IoT hardware



  





**Our Hiring Process** 




 We know your time is valuable, so here’s what to expect:
 


* Application Deadline: September 10th (we review applications as they come in and may hire earlier)
* First Round: Conversation + take-home case to understand your working style and team fit
* Next Steps: Follow-up interview to dive deeper into your skills, experience, and how we can build something great together



  





 We’re looking for curious, thoughtful people who enjoy solving real challenges and thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
 



  





 If that sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you.
 



  





 📍 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
 



 For more information or questions please contact us at cp@evewave.com

title: Generative AI Engineer
company_industry: Software Development and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**Title** 
 - AI Engineer
 



**Location** 
 - Stockholm (Flexible Hybrid Model)
 



  





**Due to the urgency of these requirements, our client is only accepting applications from applicants who have the right to work and live in Europe.** 




  





**The Role** 




 Our client, a fast-growing AI startup based in Stockholm, is looking for an experienced AI Engineer to join their ambitious team and help shape the next generation of intelligent products.
 



  





 You’ll help build intelligent systems powered by modern language models, focusing on real-world applications like search, content generation, and automation. Your work will include building agentic workflows, designing scalable pipelines, and bringing AI prototypes into production.
 


* Develop systems based on LLMs, including retrieval-augmented generation, prompt chaining, and autonomous flows.
* Evaluate and fine-tune both open-source models and commercial LLM APIs (e.g., GPT-4o, Claude, Gemini).
* Design pipelines that combine knowledge graphs, embeddings, and vector search to surface structured information.
* Work closely with product and data teams to define and build meaningful user-facing features.
* Contribute to best practices around working with LLMs and help shape a future-forward engineering culture.



  





**About You** 



* A few years of experience (3+) building real-world AI/ML systems, especially those using LLMs.
* Strong coding ability, particularly in Python, and comfort working with modern ML libraries (PyTorch, HuggingFace, etc.).
* Experience designing or deploying vector search and embedding-based systems.
* You've deployed models into production and understand how to monitor and iterate in live environments.



  





**Bonus If You’ve...** 



* Contributed to open-source tooling or published in the AI/ML space.
* Explored agent-like systems or feedback-driven model training.



  





**Why It’s Interesting** 



* You’ll get access to cutting-edge LLM APIs and infrastructure for experimentation.
* There’s plenty of room to shape direction and drive forward an AI-first mindset.
* You’ll be part of a small, experienced team that values autonomy and product thinking.
* Competitive pay and equity, with flexible working built in.



  





**We would love to hear from you!** 




  





**Please apply now by sending your CV to Ronnie at ronnie.wilson@teletechpartners.com or contact teletech Partners on +44 203 640 7429.**

title: AI Engineer
description:
**About Filed**
 Filed is building the
 **first AI tax preparer** 
 trusted by America’s accounting firms. This industry might seem boring—but it’s a $70B backbone of the economy that’s breaking under a talent shortage no one has solved. We’re fixing it—fast.
   

  

 In just 9 months, we’ve hit
 **strong product-market fit** 
 , are generating
 **fast-growing, sticky revenue** 
 , and are
 **backed by top-tier investors** 
 . We’re not a tool—we’re the missing workforce firms have been sounding the alarm for. We’re building the future with expanding our already 30 person team, with those who want to say
 **“I was there when it all started.”**
 ⸻
   

  

**Here’s Why This Is a Terrible Job**
 This is not a job for someone who likes to move slow.
   

  

 We operate week to week with ruthless speed. Sometimes we’re going in the wrong direction, but more times than not we’re going in the right direction.
   

  

 If you need a few extra days to perfect your model, chances are there’s already a handful of team members blocked behind you.
   

  

 We use tools like Cursor, OpenAI, and Gemini to prototype fast, test in prod, and push to users in hours—not quarters.
   

  

 You’ll be operating at the intersection of large language models, user behavior, regulatory compliance, and structured knowledge graphs.
   

  

 There are no clean datasets. No definitive papers. Just judgment calls, ambiguity, and noise from every direction.
   

  

 You’ll ask yourself, is this really the work?
   

  

 It is. And it’s not for everyone.
   

  

 ⸻
   

  

**Here's Why It's The Best Career Choice You'll Make**
 We’re hyperscaling. We’re very well-funded. Generating very fast revenue, and have reached a strong product market fit score all within 9 months.
   

  

 We’re building what tax pros call impossible. A product that behaves like a teammate, not just another tool.
   

  

 We run reviews every 4 months. We operate with total transparency around pay, performance, and progress.
   

  

 You’ll be paid above market. You’ll earn equity that grows fast.
   

  

 And you’ll have full autonomy to make high-impact decisions.
   

  

 You’ll ship models because you believe in them, not because they passed a review board.
   

  

 You’ll talk to users weekly. You’ll drive outcomes end to end.
   

  

 We’ll tell you the goal. How you reach it—prompting, fine-tuning, embeddings, retrieval, structured data—is up to you.
   

  

 We expect you to build a customer Oracle. An internal simulator so precise it can predict what a user will ask, before they even ask it.
   

  

 That comes from immersion, curiosity, and care.
   

  

 ⸻
   

  

**The Teammate We're Looking For**
* Thinks in probabilities, systems, and second-order consequences
* Navigates ambiguity across LLMs, APIs, and semi-structured corpora
* Gets excited by the edge cases most people run away from
* No research-for-research’s-sake — we ship fast and learn even faster
* Big bonus if you’ve shipped AI products into production, not just demos


 ⸻
   

  

**What You’ll Be Responsible For**
* Designing and implementing LLM-powered workflows across tax, finance, and compliance
* Building agentic frameworks (adk, langchain, crewai and the likes)
* Building and scaling Graphiti-like knowledge systems for memory and retrieval
* Owning prompt pipelines, vector stores, fine-tuned models, and evals
* Becoming an Oracle with a model of the customer and the domain in your head


 ⸻
   

  

**Your Hard Skillset**
* Deep understanding of how LLMs actually work under the hood—beyond the hype
* Fluency with APIs like OpenAI, Gemini, Claude; experience with structured evals
* Comfortable working across Python beyond notebooks and can write production worthy services that handle millions of complicated documents and
* Experience with cloud infra (GCP or Azure)
* Strong grasp of embeddings, RAG, structured retrieval, and production-grade inference
* Bonus if you’ve contributed to or built internal tooling for model debugging or evals


 ⸻
   

  

**Your Soft Skillset**
* Ruthlessly pragmatic—knows when to ship and when to iterate
* Empathetic with users and critical of vague assumptions
* Deeply collaborative across product, engineering, and operations
* Obsessively curious—you want to understand everything about the domain you’re automating
* You own your outcomes—and love having your work in front of real users daily


 ⸻
   

  

**Growth And Levels**
 We operate on six levels, from Level 1 to Level 6. Each reflects increasing ownership, impact, and scope with meaningful jumps in salary and equity.
   

  

 We review levels every 4 months. Promotions are based on output and ownership, not tenure.
   

  

 This isn’t a comfy AI role. It’s fast, focused, and brutally user-driven.
   

  

 You will build fast. You will learn fast. You will own what you ship.
   

  

 ⸻
   

  

**The process**
* Quick intro call
* Code and system walkthrough + async technical task
* Final round with our team
* Optional 2 to 3 day paid trial
* Then we decide together if this is the right fight


 ⸻
   

  

 If you want to work with real users, real constraints, and build AI that goes far beyond chatbot demos—this is it.
   

  

 Compensation Range: $71.5K - $149.5K

title: Senior IT Consultant
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
 Har du erfarenhet av utvecklaruppgifter? Och kan du se dig själv i en avgörande roll där du är med och säkerställer framdriften i ett större och komplext projekt? Vill du vara med och garantera att vi levererar en lösning av hög kvalitet till kunden? Då kanske du är vår nya Senior IT-konsult hos Netcompany.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter och teknologier**
 Som Senior IT-konsult har du överblick över aktuella delprojekt, vilket inkluderar att hålla dagliga stand-ups, rapportera status till kunden och/eller projektledaren. Du tar naturligt på dig ledarrollen gentemot teammedlemmarna, eftersom rollen som Senior IT-konsult snabbt innebär ansvar för teamledning. Ansvaret innebär bland annat att du fördelar arbetsuppgifter lämpligt mellan teamets medlemmar, hjälper vid behov och ser till att ingen hamnar efter. Det finns alltid en projektledare kopplad till projektet med det övergripande leveransansvaret, som du kan samarbeta med för att stärka din kompetens inom ledarskap och IT-leveranser.
   

  

 På Netcompany levererar vi projekt i tid och med hög kvalitet. Som Senior IT-konsult spelar du en avgörande roll i detta. Det förväntas att du levererar arbete av hög kvalitet i tid – och att du hjälper ditt team att göra detsamma.
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta med ett brett spektrum av etablerade teknologier, inklusive: .Net, C#, Java, Salesforce, SharePoint, Dynamics CRM, ReactJS, Angular, Azure med flera.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer bland annat att inkludera:**
* Dagligt samarbete och sparring med ditt team för att säkerställa hög teknisk och affärsmässig nivå
* Planering av arbetsflöden
* Processoptimering och kvalitetssäkring
* Att omvandla kundens krav till design av nya funktioner
* Systemutveckling och kodgranskning efter behov – både front-end, back-end och integrationer


**Om dig**
 Det är viktigt att du har en stark teknisk grund samtidigt som du är motiverad att ta dig an ledningsuppgifter.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du:
   

  

* Har erfarenhet inom IT-branschen och en relevant masterutbildning, t.ex. inom Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology eller liknande
* Har varit delaktig i att utveckla och leverera IT-lösningar
* Har erfarenhet av exempelvis Java, .Net, C# eller liknande
* Har haft ansvar för en delleverans och/eller andra utvecklare
* Har intresse för projektledning och ser din karriär utvecklas i den riktningen


**Fortsätt din utveckling hos oss**
 På Netcompany fokuserar vi på din personliga och professionella utveckling. Vi erbjuder en strukturerad karriärmodell där du kan bygga vidare på dina tidigare erfarenheter.
   

  

 När du börjar hos oss kommer du att tilldelas en personlig mentor, som blir din sparringpartner för din vidare utveckling samt dina personliga och karriärmässiga mål. Den nära relationen till en erfaren kollega ger dig konkreta insikter i olika affärs- och ansvarsområdena som matchar dina intressen och önskemål.
   

  

 Dessutom kommer du att delta i vårt utbildningsprogram, Netcompany Academy, där du erbjuds kurser och seminarier anpassade till dig och var du befinner dig i din karriär. Alla kurser undervisas av erfarna Netcompany-kollegor, vilket säkerställer att allt innehåll är relevant och bygger vidare på dina professionella färdigheter. Att delta tillsammans med kollegor från hela företaget skapar också ett nätverk och ger dig en stark grund för din karriär hos Netcompany, både professionellt och socialt.
   

  

**Bli del av en inkluderande gemenskap**
 På Netcompany prioriterar vi gemenskap högt. Vi främjar aktivt en öppen och välkomnande arbetskultur som bygger på samarbete och tillit till varandra, där det alltid finns möjlighet till sparring.
   

  

 Som en del av vår kultur och värderingar bemöts alla medarbetare, oavsett olika bakgrunder, identiteter och erfarenheter, med förståelse och respekt samt ges lika möjligheter till utveckling och trivsel.
   

  

 Du får möjlighet till att lära och samarbeta internationellt med kollegor från olika kulturer och nationaliteter, då vi är ett internationellt företag med kontor i många länder.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder en miljö där vi samarbetar med varandra tvärs över avdelning och projekt. Dessutom har vi ett brett utbud av sociala och yrkesmässiga evenemang som ger dig de bästa möjligheterna att utöka och bygga ett nätverk tidigt i din karriär.
   

  

**Skicka in din ansökan**
 Ladda upp ditt CV och ansökan till vårt rekryteringssystem via länken. Har du inte fått svar på alla dina frågor, är du välkommen att kontakta hr.dk@netcompany.com
   

  

*Alla kvalificerade kandidater uppmanas att ansöka oavsett kön, könsidentitet, sexuell läggning, funktionsnedsättning, ålder, religion och tro, politisk åsikt, nationalitet, etnicitet eller social bakgrund.*
*Vi är engagerade i att skapa en inkluderande och mångfaldig miljö. Våra rekryteringsprocesser är baserade på individuell merit. Om du har behov för anpassningar eller extra stöd under anställningsprocessen, vänligen skicka ett e-postmeddelande till våra ansvariga rekryterare på* 
*reasonableadjustmentsdk@netcompany.com* 
*för hjälp.*

title: Founders’ Associate
description:
**About Compensara** 




 We’re building the world’s first agentic compensation platform, rethinking how companies decide and act on pay. Our AI is not just a copilot — it autonomously sources, interprets, and executes on compensation insights, transforming a multi-billion-dollar industry that touches every employee on the planet.
 



  





 We’ve taken our pre-seed round, are revenue-generating, and backed by SSE Business Lab (Sweden’s #1 startup incubator) and top investors. This is an opportunity to join early, move fast, and define the category from day one.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We’re looking for a Founders’ Associate to work directly with our CEO as a strategic Swiss army knife. One week you’ll be helping close a customer deal, the next you’ll be organizing an investor update, and the next you’ll be running point on a key operational project.
 



  





**What excites you here** 



* Learning how every part of a high-growth AI startup works — from product to fundraising.
* Working on projects that are directly visible to customers, investors, and the board.
* Having a front-row seat to scaling a category-defining company.



  





**What you’ll do** 



* Support CEO in sales, fundraising, and investor relations.
* Manage operations, special projects, and cross-team coordination.
* Research market and customer insights to guide strategy.
* Build presentations, proposals, and other high-visibility materials.



  





**You might be a fit if** 



* You’re highly adaptable and thrive in unstructured environments.
* You’re detail-oriented but can zoom out to strategic thinking.
* You’re ambitious, proactive, and eager to take ownership.

title: Marketing Intern
description:
Marketing internship, role description
 



  





**Understanding the Goal** 




 We're looking for a talented and pragmatic individual who can start as a marketing intern (LIA - unpaid), with the potential to take on a full-time paid role in the marketing organization during 2026. The internship will serve as a testing ground for relevant abilities and potential fit within Xertified.
 



  





 This internship offers a unique opportunity to work on a variety of projects that will help you develop your skills and gain hands-on experience in the cybersecurity industry.
 



  





**Get to know Xertified** 




 Xertified is a Swedish cybersecurity company, from ownership to design, development and manufacturing. We have bold plans for our future where Xertified’s unique and patented cybersecurity solution makes it easy and cost effective to protect critical connected devices. Xertified was selected as one of the most promising Scale-up companies 2024 by the magazine Ny Teknik - https://www.nyteknik.se/33-listan
 



  





 Xertified – securing critical devices in IT/OT/IOT:
 



 ·      Identity based access control for connected devices
 



 ·      A DROP-IN SOLUTION
 



 ·      XoT technology™ secures any type of device on any type of IP-network, without touching or configuring the device.
 



 Our XoT technology™ platform in a nutshell: a digital lock & key for connected devices.
 



  





 At Xertified, we appreciate a variety of perspectives and experiences. We are not looking for someone who checks every single box beforehand – we’re looking for an individual with drive, that takes own initiatives, someone who is a lifelong learner, and someone who can make us and our partners better with their unique experiences and ways of thinking.
 



  





 We’re building a unique Swedish Cybersecurity company with a passion to secure society critical infrastructure, manufacturing industries, healthcare and med-tech clients.
 



  





**What we’re looking for this internship marketing role** 



* Appropriate academic foundation: Currently pursuing a degree in marketing or a related field with a strong focus on digital marketing
* Analytical mindset: Proficiency in data analysis tools and a keen eye for identifying trends and insights
* Creative flair: A strong ability to develop engaging content and communication material that resonate with the target audience
* Hands-on approach: A proven ability to turn ideas into working solutions and create necessary material to be used going forward
* Thinking beyond: A proactive approach to problem-solving and a passion for developing innovative marketing activities that aligns with current and future commercial targets and priorities
* Team player: Excellent interpersonal and communication skills with a proven ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
* Growth potential: Demonstrates ambition and a desire to take on a multitude of responsibilities and to develop in the role
* Languages skills: fluent in Swedish & English (any additional Scandinavian language is a plus)



  





**Your role in the commercial team** 




 You will be involved in a wide range of marketing activities, including:
 


* Creating and managing marketing content and messaging
* Identifying improvements in relation to existing commercial approach and messages
* Developing brand storytelling that resonates with our target audience
* Ensuring consistency across all communication channels
* Collaborating with internal & external partner teams to align messaging with business goals
* Conducting market research and analysis



 If you have a passion for marketing and a desire to make a real impact by making our society safe and our industries resilient, we encourage you to apply.
 



  





**The Xertified team today** 




 We are an ambitious team of 16 people with significant growth goals the coming years. Confident in reaching those goals, we’d love to have you onboard as a key corner stone in our new marketing team.
 



  





**Requirements** 



* Minimum an ongoing bachelor’s degree or similar
* You are positive to work in the office in the city center of Stockholm
* Du pratar flytande svenska – and you speak/write fluent business English
* A self-starter “can do” personality with a lot of aspiration and inspiration!



 You’ll be reporting to Anders Juhlin (Commercial Director). You’ll be part of our Go-To-Market team of today 4 people and growing!
 



  





**Benefits & other things** 




 This is an internship role with a proposed start in mid-August 2025. Our long-term objective is to bring the right candidate onboard full-time, most likely starting mid 2026. As an employee you will get good benefits such as 6 weeks of vacation, collective bargaining pensions etc.
 



  





**The process, step by step?** 



* First off, you’ll get on a resume screening
* Interview #1 – On Teams – screening – do we have a personal match?
* Interview #2 – Face to face - in our Stockholm office
* Interview #3 – Case assignment to get a better sense of you and your skills
* Meeting #4 – You get to meet our GTM team & our founder



  





 https://www.xertified.com/post/marketing-intern
 



  





 For more information, please visit our webpage: Identity based access control – www.Xertified.com

title: Sr Director, CIO Government Analyst, Remote EMEA
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Information Services, and Research Services
description:
**Senior Director, Government CIO Analyst – Remote EMEA**
**Description**
 Gartner is recruiting for a EMEA based Government Technology Analyst, Sr. Director, candidate with extensive experience in human/social services and one or more other government sectors (such as justice, public safety, social services, public transportation, local government) as a CIO or IT executive leader, who can deliver objective, actionable insight to senior business and IT executives in government organizations related to the management and use of technology in driving improved mission outcomes as well as to government technology and service providers.
   

  

**About the role:**
 Gartner Analysts are industry thought leaders who create must-have research, market predictions and best practices for a broad range of world-leading organizations. A Senior Director serves as a leader within Gartner’s Research and Advisory business, establishing oneself as a credible voice within their designated market at local, regional, and/or global levels. Using exceptional research and analytical skills, a Senior Director plays a significant role in producing pragmatic and provocative research which Gartner clients consume and apply to mission critical priorities. They are a trusted source of advice for clients, reinforcing Gartner’s value every day. They engage via in-person meetings, virtual meetings, sales support visits and Gartner conferences to discuss complex client challenges and offer appropriate recommendations.
   

  

 This analyst role sits within Gartner’s CIO and Industries Research, Government and Education Practice. The analyst will support CIOs and other technology executives in accelerating the use of technology, data, and artificial intelligence in government modernization and innovation.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Track EMEA and global market trends, relevant vendors and emerging technologies to remain ahead of the curve within government technology best practices, the impact of emerging technologies and changing geopolitical uncertainties
* Write evidence-based content that is easily consumed, defensible and actionable.
* Deliver high-quality actionable advice to an executive client audience (e.g., CIOs, program executive officers, CTOs, etc.) through a variety of media.
* Create and deliver presentations for webinars, executive briefings and other client-facing events.
* Build credibility as a government technology and data expert representing Gartner Research and Advisory
* Deliver outstanding sales and service support to retain and grow the Gartner business.
* Actively participate in ideation and research community discussions and collaborate effectively with colleagues across our research community.
* Identify research process improvements or develop new processes that help the team and Research & Advisory provide excellent service delivery.
* Collaborate with a variety of peers to establish positions on topics impact Government CIOs and develop research
* Be a mentor and a coach by supporting more junior team members


**What you will need:**
* 12+ years’ experience working as an information technology leader in two or more government organizations in different tiers or domains (human/social services, justice, public safety, social services, public transportation, local government).
* Bachelor's degree in related field or an equivalent combination of education and experience.
* Demonstrated executive presence; can immediately establish credibility with executives and additional stakeholders
* Ability to work in a highly collaborative environment.
* Strong organizational skills: with the ability to work under tight deadlines and produce high quality deliverables.
* Demonstrate excellence in research.
* Strong written and verbal proficiency, analytical and presentation skills; ability to engage clients and respond effectively to questions.
* Proficient in analyzing and synthesizing data; can effectively apply patterns and frameworks while drawing and defending conclusions to client challenges.
* Strong communicator who can explain complex concepts concisely and simply.
* Ability to work independently, while also being intrinsically motivated to collaborate across teams and support the workflow of others, in a multicultural global team
* Learning agility and adeptness with navigating highly matrixed environments


**Preferred Education and Experience:**
* Bachelor's degree or equivalent degree preferred
* Prior experience in a product leader or a consulting role for technology service provider working with governament.


**Who are we?**
 At Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT), we guide the leaders who shape the world.
   

  

 Our mission relies on expert analysis and bold ideas to deliver actionable, objective insight, helping enterprise leaders and their teams succeed with their mission-critical priorities.
   

  

 Since our founding in 1979, we’ve grown to more than 21,000 associates globally who support ~14,000 client enterprises in ~90 countries and territories. We do important, interesting and substantive work that matters. That’s why we hire associates with the intellectual curiosity, energy and drive to want to make a difference. The bar is unapologetically high. So is the impact you can have here.
   

  

**What makes Gartner a great place to work?**
 Our sustained success creates limitless opportunities for you to grow professionally and flourish personally. We have a vast, virtually untapped market potential ahead of us, providing you with an exciting trajectory long into the future. How far you go is driven by your passion and performance.
   

  

 We hire remarkable people who collaborate and win as a team. Together, our singular, unifying goal is to deliver results for our clients.
   

  

 Our teams are inclusive and composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations.
   

  

 We invest in great leaders who bring out the best in you and the company, enabling us to multiply our impact and results. This is why, year after year, we are recognized worldwide as a great place to work.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 Gartner offers world-class benefits, highly competitive compensation and disproportionate rewards for top performers.
   

  

 In our hybrid work environment, we provide the flexibility and support for you to thrive — working virtually when it's productive to do so and getting together with colleagues in a vibrant community that is purposeful, engaging and inspiring.
   

  

 Ready to grow your career with Gartner? Join us.
   

  

 The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.
   

  

 Gartner is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company’s career webpage as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at +1 (203) 964-0096 or by sending an email to ApplicantAccommodations@gartner.com.
   

  

 Job Requisition ID:98738
   

  

 By submitting your information and application, you confirm that you have read and agree to the country or regional recruitment notice linked below applicable to your place of residence.
   

  

 Gartner Applicant Privacy Link: https://jobs.gartner.com/applicant-privacy-policy
   

  

**For efficient navigation through the application, please only use the back button within the application, not the back arrow within your browser.**

title: Data Analyst
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, and TV channels. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, we’re searching for a
 **Data Analyst** 
 in our
 **Stockholm** 
 office – are you ready to hit play on an exciting career change?
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Data Analyst at Viaplay Group, you will play a pivotal role in transforming complex data into actionable insights, enabling us to deliver exceptional experiences to our customers. By leveraging your analytical, visualization, and data modeling skills, you’ll inspire and lead the way toward a more data-informed business. Collaborating with diverse teams, you’ll be integral in evaluating trends, optimizing strategies, and supporting data-driven decision-making. Your expertise will help shape the future of Viaplay Group through enhanced user engagement, content performance, and operational excellence.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Data Analysis & Insights: Analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and actionable insights that drive business strategies and improve user experiences
* Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams to bring the business closer to data by offering expertise, advice, and insights. Actively contribute to creating a data-informed culture across all levels of the organization
* Data Visualization: Build dashboards and reports with a strong focus on storytelling, making complex data easy to understand for stakeholders
* Strategic Impact: Partner with stakeholders to align data strategies with business goals, support roadmap decisions, and ensure appropriate tracking is in place for new initiatives
* Self-Service Analytics:Champion a self-service analytics culture across the organization, empowering teams to access, interpret, and utilize data independently
* Education & Communication: Lead and participate in data education initiatives to improve understanding and utilization of data tools and methodologies across the organization
* Process Automation: Identify opportunities for automation in data tracking, analysis, and reporting to streamline processes and improve scalability
* Documentation: Create standardized and accessible documentation to ensure clarity, reduce dependencies, and enable teams to operate autonomously


**What We’re Looking For**
